ExportText: Click on the EXPORT button to save your translated text as a file on your computer. You should send this file to your moderator, who will merge all the texts of your translation team.
WaitModerator: Wait for the moderator to send you the new file.
Importext: Click on the IMPORT button to upload the file you received from the moderator. Once you have uploaded the file into LEVEL, you will see a MERGE button. Click on it. Then click Done and NEXT.
